columns.Press_ID: The unique identifier for each press.
columns.Name: The name of the publishing press.
columns.Month_Profits_billion: The monthly profits of the press in billions.
columns.Year_Profits_billion: The yearly profits of the press in billions.

press.table_description: The table stores financial data for various publishing presses.

columns.Book_ID: The unique identifier for each book.
columns.Title: The title of the book.
columns.Book_Series: The series to which the book belongs.
columns.Author_ID: The unique identifier for the author of the book.
columns.Press_ID: The unique identifier for the publishing press.
columns.Sale_Amount: The total sales amount of the book.
columns.Release_date: The release date of the book.

book.table_description: The table catalogs books with their authors and sales data.

columns.Author_ID: The unique identifier for each author.
columns.Name: The full name of the author.
columns.Age: The age of the author in years.

author.table_description: The table stores information about authors in the publishing industry.
